body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Amelia Evans. Father of Henry Evans and Joseph Evans. Married to Ann E. Evans. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in 1860.
